thread.title: Dear Kellyanne Conway, Get Your Fucking Feet Off The White House Furniture — Sincerely, Everyone
thread.title_full: Dear Kellyanne Conway, Get Your Fucking Feet Off The White House Furniture — Sincerely, Everyone

author: Perez Hilton
title: Dear Kellyanne Conway, Get Your Fucking Feet Off The White House Furniture — Sincerely, Everyone
text:
Jimmy Kimmel is spilling the tea! 
On Monday, the funnyman took time during his opening monologue for his hit late night show, Jimmy Kimmel Live! , to address the "crazy" mix-up that went down at the Oscars . As you surely know, there was a HUGE onstage blunder when Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway mistakenly called out La La Land as the Best Picture winner -- when in reality the film Moonlight was the victor. 
Photos: 5 Times The Wrong Winner Was Announced On TV 
While the situation was pretty "confusing" for those at the ceremony, Kimmel admits he found the whole thing pretty amusing. Us too, Jimmy. Us too! 
Thankfully, Jimmy has since given his fans a play-by-play of what exactly happened during the awards show. And, boy, is his commentary EVERYTHING! 
Be sure to ch-ch-check out what the 49-year-old had to say on all the drama for yourself (below)!
